oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Doss Haney McAllister
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Doss Haney McAllister appears in his World War I uniform. He enlisted December 14, 1917 at Ft. Oglethorpe, Georgia and was assigned to Btry. E, 60th Arty, of the Coastal Art. Corps. Later he transferred to the 9th Co., Coastal Art. Corps stationed along Cheasapeake Bay. The Coastal Artillery manned installations to protect the coast. McAllister was discharged on February 25, 1918 with a ten percent disability. The nature of his injury is unknown.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: McAllister, Doss Haney
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
